sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import './Chat.css' import {Avatar, IconButton} from '@mui/material' import {AttachFile, InsertEmoticon, MoreVert, SearchOutlined} from '@mui/icons-material' import axios from 'axios' import {useSelector} from 'react-redux' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' export default function Chat() { const [seed ,setSeed] = useState('') const [input , setInput] = useState('') const {displayName,user} = useSelector(state=>state.authState) const {roomId} = useParams() const sendMessage = async(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() console.log(input); if (!input) { return; } await axios.post(`http://localhost:8000/api/v1/message/new`,{ name : displayName, message : input, timestamps : Date.now(), roomId : roomId, uid : user.uid }) setInput(''); } useEffect(()=>{ axios.get(`http://localhost:8000/api/v1/room/${roomId}`) },[]) useEffect(()=>{ setSeed(Math.floor(Math.random() * 5000)) },[]) return (

React developer

Last Update at {new Date().toString().slice(0,25)}

Mohamed Aflal Hello from Aflal {new Date().toString().slice(0,25)}

Mohamed Apsal Hello from Apsal {new Date().toString().slice(0,20)}

setInput(e.target.value)} value={input}/>
) }
